## Grafico de Barras

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(tidyverse))
PhenoData <- readRDS(here::here("output", "DadosFenotipicosv2.RDS"))

# Figura 1. Grafico de barras para resistencia a manchas foliares em mandioca.
PhenoData %>% filter(!is.na(traits), !is.na (Y)) %>% group_by(traits, Y) %>%
  summarise(y = n()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = traits, y = Y, fill = as.character(Y))) +
  scale_fill_brewer(type = "div", palette = 7) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill", stat = "identity") + guides(fill = guide_legend(title = "Score"))
```

## Grafico de Distribuicao

```{r}
# Figura 2. Grafico de Distribuicao para resistencia a manchas foliares em mandioca.
PhenoData %>% ggplot(aes(x = Y)) + geom_density(adjust = 2.5, fill = "darkgreen") + 
  facet_wrap(~ traits) + xlim(-1,6) + xlab("Scores") +
  theme(legend.position="none",
        panel.spacing = unit(0.1, "lines"),
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank())
```
